'''Minecraft x Hello Kitty''' is a merchandise collaboration between ''[[Minecraft]]'' and ''{{Wikipedia|Hello Kitty}}'' multimedia franchises.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.trendhunter.com/trends/hello-kitty-and-friends-dlc|title=Adorable Interactive Game Partnerships|author=Amy Duong|website=TREND HUNTER|date=January 23, 2025}}</ref>

== About ==
'''Hello Kitty''', also known by her real name ''Kitty White'', is a fictional character created by {{Wikipedia|Yuko Shimizu}}, currently designed by {{Wikipedia|Yuko Yamaguchi}}, and owned by the Japanese company {{Wikipedia|Sanrio}}. Sanrio depicts Hello Kitty as a British anthropomorphized white cat with a red bow and no visible mouth. According to her backstory, she lives in a {{Wikipedia|London}} suburb with her family, and is close to her twin sister [https://sanriowiki.com/wiki/Mimmy Mimmy], who is depicted with a yellow bow.

== Marketplace releases ==
=== Hello Kitty and Friends ===
[[File:1oxDGVDayK7oiWPR.mp4|226x226px|thumb|Hello Kitty transitioning to Minecraft.]]
Released on January 21, 2025, the Hello Kitty and Friends world is a world dedicated to exploring the world of Hello Kitty, where players can meet various characters from the series.
